CONGRESSWOMAN Gabrielle Giffords 's condition has been upgraded from critical to serious, Tucson's University Medical Centre said today. The hospital said the change was made because she is no longer on a ventilator. It reported she continues to do well. Earlier today, her friend Senator Kirsten Gillibrand said Ms Gabrielle Giffords had improved to the point where she could move both sides of her body, including her arms and legs.
